## Api class

API service

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Api extends Framework.Service implements Framework.Api 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Framework.Service

<b>Implements:</b> Framework.Api

## Remarks

Binds facade methods to the framework and provides a means to call the methods directly for immediate execution.

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [call(name, args)](./bud-api.api.call.md) |  | Call an api method directly |
|  [dump()](./bud-api.api.dump.md) |  | Dump the method call trace |
|  [processQueue()](./bud-api.api.processqueue.md) |  | Execute all queued method calls |
